text: Dirgahayu Tanahairku is a patriotic Malaysian national song. It is composed by Tan Yee Chow. Saadiah Mohamad is the lyricist. ==Lyrics== ===Original song=== :Kau persada indah permai :Pepohon menghijau, menghias pantai :Putera-puterimu tersenyum riang ria :Tegas, bebas, sejahtera, makmur, maju jaya! :Di bawah naungan payung mahkota :Oh, pertiwiku perkasa :Disanjung, dipuja setiap masa :Berwaspada, sentiasa bersemangat waja :Satu bangsa, satu bahasa, satu budaya :Malaysia nusaku tercinta :korus... :Tumpuan pelancong :Dan juga para peniaga :Batik songket tenunan menawan :Terkenal, merata dunia... :Kepadamu, oh pertiwi :Kasihku abadi, sejati murni :Relaku berbakti mesti berkorban diri :Padamu ku curah sumpah setia dan janji :Dirgahayu, oh tanahairku! :ulang korus... :Kepadamu, oh pertiwi :Kasihku abadi, sejati murni :Relaku berbakti mesti berkorban diri :Padamu ku curah sumpah setia dan janji :Dirgahayu, oh tanahairku! :Dirgahayu, oh tahanairku! ===English translation=== :You are the abode of beauty :The green trees, adorning your beaches :Your princes and princesses smile happily :Stern, free, peaceful,prosperous, progressive! :Under the rule of the reigning monarch :Oh my profound land :Exalted, glorified all the time :Always on guard, always in high spirits :One nation, one language, one culture :Oh Malaysia my beloved realm :A renowned destination for tourists :And merchants :Your enchanting weaves of batik and songket :celebrated around the world :To you, my motherland :My love is eternal, true and virtuous :Will i fight till my last breath :To you i rest my oath of fidelity :Long live, oh my Motherland! ==See also== *Negaraku (National anthem) *List of Malaysian patriotic songs Category:Malaysian patriotic songs Category:Malaysian culture Category:Malay-language songs
title: Dirgahayu Oh Tanahairku
